snippet: A group of prominent scientists and writers urged Mexico, the United States and Canada to commit to restoring the habitat that supports the insect’s migration across the continent.
abstract: Group of prominent scientists and writers urge Mexico, United States and Canada to commit to restoring habitat that supports monarch butterfly’s migration across the continent; species has suffered blow as milkweed, its only source of food, has been disappearing from North America.
lead_paragraph: A group of prominent scientists and writers urged Mexico, the United States and Canada to commit to restoring the habitat that supports the insect’s migration across the continent.

headline.main: North American Leaders Urged to Restore Monarch Butterfly’s Habitat
headline.print_headline: Leaders Urged to Restore Monarch Butterfly’s Habitat
